name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Experienced Mobile App Developer with 13+ years in delivering high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Specialized in **Google Flutter**, **Dart**, and proficient in **BLoC Architecture**, **Cubit**, and effective **State Management** for robust mobile app design. Highly skilled in both frontend and backend development, leveraging a strong tech stack that includes **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
Demonstrated ability to create AI/ML-powered platforms with predictive analytics and automation, alongside extensive experience in cloud deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**. Committed to adherence to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS and equipped with a solid background in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. A proactive communicator with a strong capacity for team collaboration and independence in remote work environments.
